rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Courtyard
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall that opens into a central courtyard. The courtyard is designed to optimize natural light and ventilation, incorporating local landscaping elements.

rooms.name: Living Area / Dining Area
rooms.description: An art deco-inspired living area with elegant geometric patterns and rich color palettes. This multi-functional space doubles as dining area, featuring large windows for abundant natural light.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A well-equipped kitchen designed in an art deco style, incorporating modern appliances with vintage accents, ensuring efficient ventilation and functionality.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom designed for relaxation and privacy. Features include a large window facing the courtyard for optimal natural light, in-line with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom with access to the central courtyard for natural ventilation.
